content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I executed shell commands, listed files in a directory, executed Python files, read, wrote, and appended to files, and attempted to replace text in a file, but the command returned no matches found. The read_file command returned text, the append_to_file command returned "Text appended successfully," and the write_to_file command returned "File written to successfully." The list_files command returned an empty list previously, but now it lists files in a directory.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "write_to_file", "args": {"filename": "<filename>", "text": "<text>"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "<command_line>"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "list_files", "args": {"directory": "<directory>"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "append_to_file", "args": {"filename": "<filename>", "text": "<text>"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command append_to_file returned: Text appended successfully.', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "read_file", "args": {"filename": "<filename>"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command read_file returned: <text><text>', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_python_file", "args": {"filename": "<filename>"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command execute_python_file returned: Error: Invalid file type. Only .py files are allowed.', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "replace_in_file", "args": {"filename": "<filename>", "old_text": "<old_text>", "new_text": "<new_text>", "occurrence_index": "<occurrence_index>"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command replace_in_file returned: No matches found for <old_text> in /home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/<filename>', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "list_files", "args": {"directory": "<directory>"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "write_to_file", "args": {"filename": "<filename>", "text": "<text>"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command write_to_file returned: File written to successfully.', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "read_file", "args": {"filename": "<filename>"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_python_file", "args": {"filename": "<filename>"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command execute_python_file returned: Error: Invalid file type. Only .py files are allowed.', type='action_result')]
"""
